event.title: FSFE at Hackmeeting HackIT 2025 in Cagliari, Italy

body.p: On May 30 and 31, Dario Presutti, FSFE project manager, will be at Hackmeeting HackIT 2025 in Cagliari (Italy). On May 30, from 16:30 to 17:00 (CEST), he will give a talk about "Our fight for Software Freedom in Europe", entangling FSFE's work on device neutrality, router freedom and presenting the Next Generation Internet initiative.
